text: 3.16 Jon 3.16, 13.1, 15.13, Lom 5.8, Gal 1.4, Epe 5.2, 5.25, 1 Te 2.8 Jisas Klays chɨnop nen kumak. Kumek, chɨn binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop mapen lep jɨj ak nopun. Anɨb ak tek, gos chɨn ke nep nɨŋɨd mɨdtep gɨnɨgun agɨl ma nɨgɨnɨgun. Mam ay okok kɨlop gos nɨŋɨd, mɨdtep gɨnɨgel agɨl kɨlop gɨtep gɨnɨgun.
